description_for_human: plugin that rolls a real dice and returns the result as a video URL.
description_for_model: plugin that rolls a real dice and returns the result as a video URL. Paste the video_url inside the code block as an image link (result_url) for the user to see. Don't use thumb_url. Also paste the video_url as the video download link in the same code block.The result of the dice can only be found in the result_url or video_url, so let the user know the result by looking at that image.The service is known by the name "Fresh Random Numbers Direct Delivery Service" or "新鮮な乱数直送サービス"
